entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for April 22, 2024

summary.caption: Editor's note: This is a special cartoon Gary drew for Earth Day 1990, as part of a project in which many cartoonists participated to bring more awareness to the state of the environment.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for April 22, 2024

summary.caption: “And, if you squint your eyes just right, you can see the zork in the Earth.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for April 22, 2024

summary.caption: At night, the forest custodians would arrive—sometimes stopping work to laugh and gossip about the habits of certain daytime animals.

summary.caption: Sixty-five million years ago, when cows ruled the Earth
